name: Interface FunctionDeclarationTree
text:
A tree node for a function declaration.

 For example:
 
   function name
      ( parameters )
      body
 

   function* name
      ( parameters )
      body
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface FunctionDeclarationTree
extends StatementTree

methods.description: Returns the name of the function being declared.
Returns the parameters of this function.
Returns the body of code of this function.
